topic.title: What are the best ways to publish the binary files of my games and videos over Zeronet?
topic.body:
I thought I can do it by converting the binary files into base64 code, and publish it on my zeroblog, and ask the users to convert it back into a binary file. This way I have full control of my sites and I needn't worry about someone modifying it without my permission. 
There must be other ways. What do you think?
